script: To represent that this file is 'index.js', I'll just put a comment here
Then, we'll add a simple console.log statement to the file. We'll learn in the coming lessons what the console is and how to use it.
For example, if I wanted to write the value of some variable, I could do that with console.log.
code:
var myVariable = "Important variable I want to keep track of";
console.log(myVariable);
